Please read the output to determine what went wrong. {code} I found that another repository (hyperledger, https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core) also have a same error in branch '0-7' how can i fix this error? ---- ps. I cloned v0.8.0 tagged files in hyperledger repository, and there was no 'Hash Sum mismatch' error. but, VM in this branch cannot runs the tutorial files. >
